name: Recursive Repairman
description:
You've been extended an offer for a job as a repairman at RecursiCo, the visionary creator of the Recursive Robot.  To complete the job, you'll have to fix robots... by fixing robots inside them... and so on.

This game was made in 30 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam. Yeah, Ludum Dare is a 72 hour jam, but I didn't realize that Ludum Dare had started until Sunday afternoon, and I *really* wanted to participate. I cut a lot of corners because of the short time I had (like omitting audio). 

(Also don't forcibly resize the window, it will probably break the robot zoom effect)

The Ludum Dare page for the game can be found here!

CONTROLS

arrow keys - move

Z - grab boxes

X - go inside robot

R - reset level
